import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homeowners', templateUrl: './homeowners.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homeowners.component.css'] }) export class HomeownersComponent { homeownersIllustration = ` `; }

Complete Home Protection

Everything you need to protect your biggest investment.

Dwelling Coverage

Protection for your home's structure and built-in appliances

Personal Property

Coverage for your belongings, both at home and away

Liability Protection

Coverage if someone gets injured on your property

Additional Living Expenses

Temporary housing costs if your home becomes unlivable

Why Choose Lemonade?

Lightning Fast

Get quoted and covered in minutes, not days. File claims through our AI chatbot Maya.

Fair Pricing

We take a flat fee and give the rest back through our annual Giveback program.

Social Good

Unclaimed money goes to charities chosen by our community through Giveback.

Ready to Get Covered?

Join over 1 million happy customers who trust Lemonade to protect their homes.
